name: BlackScreenThunderstormSounds
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: black screen
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Perfect for Echo Show users who want a darkened Echo Show screen at night time, Black Screen plays a loop of thunderstorm and light rain sounds and has a black background. For other non-display users, enjoy expertly produced thunderstorm sounds by Healing.FM, a top-rated Alexa Developer. Perfect to help you study, relax or sleep.

HOW TO START
Just say: "Alexa, open Black Screen"

TRY BLACK SCREEN FOR
+ Dark Echo Show screen
+ Good night's sleep
+ Peaceful environment
+ Improving your mood
+ Focus on study
+ Meditation

UNLIMITED PRO FEATURES
+ 10 Hours Seamless Loop
+ Unlimited Looping (play for days!)
+ Our Ultimate Audio Quality

REVIEWS & FEEDBACK
We’d love your feedback and would appreciate if you could leave us a review for this skill. If you have any questions or need support, please contact: team@healing.fm

HEALING FM STUDIOS
From our studios next to the beautiful Pacific Ocean, we create and broadcast high quality relaxation experiences. Every month, more than 1 million people around the world use Healing FM sounds to find a moment of relaxation or prepare for a peaceful night's sleep. We hope you enjoy our sounds!
